<h2>Project 3</h2> JSON Configuration Manager Difficulty: 1/10 | Duration:
1-2 days | Tech: JSON, Python <br>
What You Build: A tool that reads JSON configuration files, updates specific
values, validates structure, and saves changes back.<br>
Exact Steps: <br>1. Load JSON config file (settings for ML model, API keys,
etc.) <br>2. Display current configuration <br>3. Update specific values (database URL,
batch size, etc.) <br>4. Validate JSON structure is still valid <br>5. Save updated config
back to file <br>6. Show config before/after changes<br>
Learning Goals: - Working with JSON format - Python data structures (dicts)
- File operations with JSON - Data validation basics<br>
Real-World Use: Application configuration management, ML model hyper-
parameters, API settings
